Notes: Leni Reifenstahl 's Nazi propaganda film chronicling the 1936 Summer Olympics

Notes: French film about 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki , Finland

Notes: A look back at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Japan

Notes: A documentary highlighting the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City

Notes: Eight directors ' takes on 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich

Notes: The animal kingdom stages its own Summer Olympics
